Package org.liquidengine.legui.component

Class CheckBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liquidengine.legui.component.Component
      • org.liquidengine.legui.component.CheckBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TextComponent
    public class CheckBox
extends Component
implements TextComponent
    An implementation of a check box -- an item that can be selected or deselected, and which displays its state to the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
